title: Second Conditionals for Hypothetical Situations
objectives: Understand Conditionals Second at Beginner level
Apply Conditionals Second in real conversations

vocabulary.example: If I were rich, I would travel the world.
If I had a million dollars...

vocabulary.definition: to think of something not real

content.introduction: Welcome to this lesson on Conditionals Second.
content.explanation: In this lesson, you will learn about Conditionals Second at the Beginner level.
tips: Practice Conditionals Second daily for best results.

exercises.question: Choose the correct sentence: a) If I was you, I would apologize. b) If I were you, I would apologize.
If she ____ (have) more time, she would travel.
Describe a situation you would do if you were famous.

culturalNote: Second conditionals are often used in American English for expressing wishes, dreams, or regrets about the present or future.
